General

  • Installation

    cwc makes it easy for you to start developing your second screen applications. We have developed the framework so that minimal setup is required but hightly customisable.

  • Connecting

    When you have installed the cwc node server, connecting clinet so that they can shear bidrectinal data can be acomplised is just a few steps.

  • Hooks

    Hooks are the building blocks of the cwc object allowing everything to connect by providing a way of defining callback functionality for series of events. Hooks can also be used to invoke hooks created on clients within the same cluster group.

  • Pullbars

    Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry’s standard dummy text ever since the 1500s

  • Navgroup & Navitems

    The Navgroup is a flexible, powerful component for navigation around big screen experience. You can quickly build simply to complex navigation structure to your application, allowing your users move around freely using keyboard events.

  • Gesture Pad

    4 or 8 way directional touch or swipe pad, perfect if you need more dynamic movement around around your application.

  • Directional pad

    A 1-way or 5-way Directional pad is perfect for games movement, user interfaces or if you want to have 4 buttons on a controller.

Documentation

Analog controller

last updated: Jan 24, 2016

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry’s standard dummy text ever since the 1500s

Simple html sample

Elements with an data-cwc-controller="analog" attribute applied to them will be treated as an Analog controller by the cwc object. The child span tag is required in order to be used as the Analog controller stick. To add the cwc style to your Analog controller toy will need to include the class name of .cwc-style.

JavaScript Declaration

To create a new instance of Analog controller The file _AnalogController.js must be included in the **cwc main JS file to use this plugin, along with _ControllerMaster.js.

Analog controller Instructions

Additional settings can be added to each Analog controller through the use of the data-cwc-instructions data attribute.

Instructions Types Descriptions
movement-type String How you want your users to interact with the Analog controller.
on-move Hook Requires custom hook to be call when the action occurs.
panstart Hook Requires custom hook to be call when the action occurs.
panend Hook Requires custom hook to be call when the action occurs.

Movement type

You can change the way the user interacts with the Analog controller by setting the movement-type property within the data instructions attribute.

Instruction Type Values
movement-type String pan or tick

  • Pan: Recognised when the pointer is down and moved in the allowed direction.

  • Tick: Will continuously invoke the hook function when when pointer is down, regardless if movment is happening or not.

Setting moment type snippet

On move

The On move events is invoked depending on which type of movement setting has been applied to the Analog controller

Instruction Type Argument
on-move Hook d-hook:cwc:navgroup-action, d-hook:, hook:

The on-move instruction can also be set up to work along side the [Navgroups]/chameleon-web-controller(/components/Navgroup.) component. Adding d-hook:cwc:navgroup-action as an argument for this instruction will initiate this relationship.

Setting on-move snippet

The on on-move instruction will be feedback information about the type of movement that has occurred. Information about the type of feedback information provided can be found [Controller Returned InputData]/chameleon-web-controller(/other/ControllerReturnedInputData.).

Panstart

The Panstart events is invoked as soon as the user starts to interact with the component. This events is fired regardless of it’s movement type.

Instruction Type Argument
panstart Hook Requires custom hook

Setting panstart snippit

The on panstart instruction will be feedback information about the type of movement that has occurred. Information about the type of feedback information provided can be found [Controller Returned InputData]/chameleon-web-controller(/other/ControllerReturnedInputData.).

Panend

The Panend events is invoked as soon as the user has finished interacting with the Analog controller. This events is fired regardless of it’s movement type.

Instruction Type Argument
panend Hook Requires custom hook

Setting panstart snippit

The on panstart instruction will be feedback information about the type of movement that has occurred. Information about the type of feedback information provided can be found [Controller Returned InputData]/chameleon-web-controller(/other/ControllerReturnedInputData.).
